scripts.deploy: (cd ./backend && npm run deploy) && (cd ./frontend && npm run deploy)
scripts.start: concurrently --names=frontend,backend,database --prefix-colors=green,blue,gray --kill-others "(cd ./frontend && npm run start)" "(cd ./backend && npm run start)" "(cd ./database && node ./start.js)"
scripts.update: npm update && (cd ./backend && npm update) && (cd ./frontend && npm update)
